formElement.label: Puppet Path:
formElement.documentation: Provide the path to the puppet executable e.g /usr/local/bin/puppet. (Required)

formElement.label: Manifest Type:
formElement.documentation: Choose the manifest type to use, available opcions are: File, TextArea. (Required)

formElement.label: Manifest:
formElement.documentation: Provide the manifest to run. If the Manifest Type selected is File a path to a manifest file must be provided, if the Manifest Type selected is Text Area the content of the manifest must be typed directly in this field. (Required)

formElement.label: Debug:
formElement.documentation: If checked full debugging will be enabled.

formElement.label: Verbose Mode:
formElement.documentation: If checked the verbose mode is activated.
